metadata.description: Standard production preset with Fun Inpaint for smooth motion

runs.coherenceNotes: The motion is smooth and natural, with no flickering or glitches. The leather armchair moves from left to right as expected, and all key objects remain consistent in type and count. No black frames or severe artifacts detected.
runs.summary: The video successfully captures a smooth camera pan across a cozy cafe interior with excellent object consistency and minimal artifacts. The lighting and composition remain faithful to the keyframes.

context.sceneDescription: A person walking on a sidewalk passes behind a lamppost, briefly occluded, then re-emerges on the other side. Static camera, consistent lighting, tests identity preservation through temporary occlusion.
context.motionDescription: Man walks steadily from left to right across frame. As he passes the lamppost in the center, he is briefly occluded (hidden behind it), then re-emerges on the right side. His identity (gray hoodie, blue jeans, same face/build) must remain consistent before and after occlusion. Static camera throughout.

context.sceneDescription: A single woman (same person throughout) sitting at a wooden desk by a window. The scene is completely static except for the gradual lighting change. The woman maintains the SAME pose, SAME position, SAME appearance. No sudden movements, no flickering, no black frames, no distortion.
context.motionDescription: Completely static scene with gradual lighting transition ONLY. The woman does NOT move - she maintains the SAME pose throughout. The ONLY change is lighting: window light slowly dims as sky darkens, desk lamp slowly brightens. The transition is smooth and continuous with NO sudden changes, NO flickering, NO black frames, NO distortion. All objects remain in exactly the same positions.

context.sceneDescription: A colorful wooden spinning top toy sitting still on a wooden table, with camera slowly pushing in slightly
context.motionDescription: The spinning top remains completely still and stationary throughout. The camera slowly and smoothly pushes in slightly, moving from a medium shot to a slightly closer shot. The top stays in perfect sharp focus the entire time. No object motion, just subtle camera movement.

context.sceneDescription: A single cream-colored ceramic coffee mug with latte art sits in sharp focus on a warm wooden counter. The primary focus is this one mug - it never moves, never multiplies, never changes. In the blurred background, a single barista in a black apron pours from one consistent stainless steel pitcher (not a flask, not a coffee pot - always the same single pitcher).
context.motionDescription: The foreground mug remains absolutely still in place - it never moves, never multiplies. Steam rises naturally from the same mug. The barista's motion is smooth and continuous: starts at espresso machine, reaches toward the counter, pours from the SAME stainless steel pitcher into the SAME mug. The pitcher type never changes. No additional cups appear.

runs.coherenceNotes: The lighting transition is smooth and natural, with only minor color banding in the final frame. The apple and orange transform correctly without flickering, and all other objects remain perfectly consistent in position and appearance.
runs.summary: The video maintains high fidelity to the keyframes with minimal artifacts and consistent object placement, though some minor color banding and slight focus shifts are present.

runs.coherenceNotes: All key objects remain consistent in type and position. The only change is the fruit on the cutting board becoming sliced, which is rendered naturally. No artifacts or focus issues were detected.
runs.summary: The video accurately depicts the kitchen scene with precise object placement and a subtle lighting shift, maintaining high visual fidelity throughout.

runs.coherenceNotes: Minor color shift in the final frame is barely noticeable. No flickering, glitches, or focus issues. All key objects remain perfectly consistent in type, position, and appearance.

context.sceneDescription: A clean modern kitchen with stable soft lighting. Objects remain fixed throughout. Only change is fruit on cutting board becomes sliced. Static camera, gentle lighting with no harsh transitions.
context.motionDescription: Static camera with completely fixed composition. Very gentle, subtle lighting shift - no dramatic transitions. The only object change is the fruit on cutting board becomes sliced. All other objects (mug, plant, appliances) remain in exact same positions. Lighting stays soft and diffused throughout with no flares or glares.
